name: HMCharacteristicWriteAction
desc: An action in an action set that writes a value to a characteristic.

items.name: init(characteristic: HMCharacteristic, targetValue: TargetValueType)
items.desc: Initialize a characteristic write action with a specified characteristic and target value.

items.name: var characteristic: HMCharacteristic
items.desc: The characteristic whose value is to be written by the action.

items.name: var targetValue: TargetValueType
items.desc: The value that will be written to the characteristic when the action is executed.
